Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel away from City Centre”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights january nice hotel comfortable city centre metro l7 line el station doing construction takes city found l3 station 10 min walk hotel service frequent change trains 10 metro card 10 euro cheaper paying time tv spanish able change english remote using button changes voices original english american bathroom found hot water shower cold usage times safe lock valuables leave 20 euro deposit reception tried breakfast worth price selection sitting time lot choices dining immediate

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights week bit difficult please directions review enjoyed stay feel worth frank hotel bit dated average clean uk travel lodge close staff lovely speak pretty english polite helpful 4th floor expected en suite challenged space shower knack changing temperature half shower gel left bathroom samples bed towels changed cleaned daily standard bed comfortable sound proofing hear late night flats opposite disturbed night probably breakfast book reception set 10 euros plus tax buffet pleasant surroundings reception hot food choice scrambled eggs bacon spicy sausage soon cooled plate rest buffet prefer local breakfast directions hotel airport journey time airport hotel approx 1 hour please note train companies train ticket buy airport station valid metro easily multi company tickets city onto metro hard confusing machines metro stations tickets 10 journeys train companies easy assuming arrive barcelona international airport train barcelona city 4th stop passieg de gracia station onto metro l3 line light green signs stop catalunya station change onto l7 line brown signs hotel direction 5 stops el putxet pronounced onto street hill 50 yards left short slope hotel 100 yards road

Reviews.Title: “Great place !”
Reviews.Author: Micki L
Reviews.Content: returned spending 8 days barcelona neat hotel enjoyed located residential 12 minute walk metro station convenience stores basic roomy clean cleaned daily cant wonderful front desk staff friendly accommodating helpful informative spent lot time helping guests plan day routes etc didnt highly buffet offered 10 euros dining else enjoy nice able computer free reception relax book didnt return travelling near hotel dark safe couple city bus tours enjoyed travelled city metro help front desk staff hotel trouble negotiating stairs watch endless stairs metro stations stations escalators elevators loved hotel hesitation recommending stay

Reviews.Title: “Staff very helpful, safe area and hotel close to metro”
Reviews.Author: ECamilleri
Reviews.Content: staff hotel helpful except waitress little change day wireless connection poor help hotel middle ramblas closest subway 1minute barcelona reachable minutes stood bit taxi expensive expected 10 euros form ramblas 14 euros mind hotels type located centrally cost

Reviews.Title: “Clean rooms, friendly staff in a quiet/safe part of Barcelona - a hidden gem”

Reviews.Content: hotel especially price located quiet upscale district barcelona easy access trains efficient 1015min transport city center walking distance amazing parc del del putxet parc guell gaudis parc guell adjacent parc del provides quiet ie nearly tourist free shaded views city pick items nearby market makings ideal picnic hotel staff friendly welcoming tour spain immediately offered map inquired jet tubs appreciated day walking city positives friendly helpful staff quiet clean updated location neighborhood proximity easy wifi access value negatives roomsbathrooms broken minibar repaired 5night stay nice access cool beverages definitely stay hear visit barcelona dont mind 1015min ride city center worth worth quality

Reviews.Content: hotel absolutely superb loved staff friendly breakfast awesome nice clean bad thinking experience hotel stay recommend families business people couples absolutely

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised - ignore Street View photos!”
Reviews.Author: MoreCheeseGrommit
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights booked directly christmas pleasantly surprised standard especially rate wed paid bb pn shown 3 star probably close 4 little clean finished free wifi breakfast cheap cafe course unlimited hot cold buffet friendly staff spoke english hotel located residential easy cheap city public transport look google street view photos booking looked bit grim etc actually street fine perfectly safe night weve stayed barcelona times hotel value money tip check restaurante el putxet station friendly staff nice tapas plenty locals usually sign

Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights mitre barcelona friendly stuff clean bathroom renovation 10 minutes walk metro station directly city center tourist recommended prices reasonable hotel park

Reviews.Content: hotel barcelona walking distance park guell gaudi 3 minutes walk station takes barcelona 10 mintes maximum terrace drink affordable bottle wine day intense visiting

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Location is Alright.”
Reviews.Author: TJS525
Reviews.Content: hotel clean staff friendly breakfast morning location ok walking distance couple subway stops city store 20 meters street sells snacks beverages lot hotel subway stops running considering people dont night return hotel earlier relied subway restaurants bars nice minifridge overall pleased price paid quality received

Reviews.Title: “A great hotel”
Reviews.Author: greeny1012
Reviews.Content: stayed april whilst celebrated birthday none complain hotel little warm evenings quiet location lovely especially conviently located close metro palau reial grabbed breakfast outside metro station corner shop main entrance cheap food hotel lovely complaints

Reviews.Content: hotel value maybe slightly central location metro stop close hotel staff approachable suffered bad ants cleaner sorted complaint tv breakfasts beware pricey arent included tasted
